detail_desc: Cargo trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with press-studs and bellows pockets on the legs with a flap and press-studs. Elastic drawstrings with plastic cord locks at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and two slits at the front.

Wide, off-the-shoulder top in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Wide, pleated flounce at the top with concealed elastication and voluminous, balloon sleeves with narrow, internal elastication at the cuffs.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Slides in imitation leather with twisted straps at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Long-sleeved top in a fine knit with smocked seams.
Knitted jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with wide, half-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt dress in a striped modal weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Round make-up bag in satin with a drawstring and handle at the top. Three inner compartments, two with a zip, and four brush holders. Lined. Size 27.5x27.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top and a pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide smocking at the waist.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Rib-knit hat in soft wool with a turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative drawstring waist at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

prod_name: Julius WP Winterboot SB SC ASQ
detail_desc: Waterproof, warm-lined boots in fabric with imitation leather and grosgrain details. Padded shaft with an imitation leather appliqué, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a gentle V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Nylon jacket with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, a fleece-lined stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets with a flap, and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
Set with six ear cuffs and a pair of hoop earrings in metal. The earrings and four of the ear cuffs are decorated with glass rhinestones.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a yoke front and back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fleece-lined hat in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Sewn-on ears at the top, earflaps with a faux fur lining, and a hook and loop tab under the chin. The hat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dungaree dress in soft cotton twill with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.
Turbans in soft cotton jersey with a decorative gathered detail at the front.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Drawstring at the sides to create a draped effect.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with raw edges.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a printed cotton weave with elasticated smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Short satin shorts with flounces at the front and an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with hole-knit sections at the front. V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined top section.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top. Seam at the waist with a wide, pleated waistband at the front and elastication at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with pleats and covered buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the hems.
Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist and wide, tapered legs with decorative seams at the hems.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Suede sandals with a decorative bow in shimmering metallic leather on the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft, loose-knit wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless. straight-cut top in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and gathered side seams.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Cold shoulder top in a textured cotton weave containing glittery threads. Narrow shoulder straps and embroidery at the neckline that continues down over the shoulders. Wide, elasticated smocking at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded parka with a detachable lined hood with a faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbing at the cuffs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Long jacket in jacquard-patterned jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.3 cm.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped side pockets, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Blouse woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Square neckline, concealed buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with a flounce. Pleated bodice and sleeves for added volume, a tie belt at the waist and flared peplum.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals in imitation leather with an appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Brushed inside.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
